ZoneText: Coaching class staffer booked for `1.3cr fraud

Mumbai: Mulund police have booked the assistant manager of acoaching class, Harshad Kabule, and his wife, Shweta Bhagat, for allegedly forging the signature of the company management and siphoning off nearly Rs 1.3 crore. The FIR said during an audit in June, the firm learnt about the cheating. Kubale said he transferred Rs 50 lakh from the company account into FDs in its name and gave four receipts, which were later found to be fake, the FIR said. During further probe, it transpired that Rs 35 lakh were transferred into Bhagat’s accounts. On August 25, Kabule admitted the crime and claimed to have spent the money to buy a flat and ornaments and promised to return it. “He failed to repay, prompting the company to lodge a complaint,” said a police officer.
